HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: WHAT'S NEW? The mod is now available in French. - Core: Support for RimWorld 1.4 has been removed. - Core: You can now request reinforced barrels from Nightmare Moon once you research mortars. - Core: Enemies now have a chance to drop ruined plushies, which you can recycle at the plushie bench to get some materials. - Core: Nightmare Moon is no longer accepting item returns. - Core: Once you've researched brewing, Daybreaker will be able to help you make wort. - Biotech: The Diamond Dogs have learned archery. - Anomaly: Thingpone recipes now require twisted meat as well as silver. - Ponies of the Rim: Ponies will no longer spawn with the xenotypes and/or genes added by My Little RimPony. Refer to the changelog for full details on all the changes! (There's a lot.)

WHAT'S NEW? - Core: You can now request 50 units of herbal medicine from Nightmare Moon in exchange for 250 units of (vegetarian) food. - Anomaly: Added Thingpone. This adorable eldritch horror will offer you items from beyond the void in exchange for silver (and, in one case, twisted meat). - Anomaly: You can now purchase dread leather from the Fabric Exchange. - Anomaly: Added two new recipes to the Daybreaker statue, allowing you to convert silver to bioferrite and vice versa. Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - Core: Added Miss Harshwhinny, a passive cooler that can freeze a room at twice the fuel cost - Biotech: Added the Renegade Alicorn scenario WHAT'S CHANGED? - Core: Poison joke plants now require 70% soil fertility (was 140%) - Core: Doubled the hitpoints of Screwballs Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - Biotech: Added the batpony xenotype and faction (requires Alpha Genes) - Removed many of the conversion recipes from the Daybreaker statue - Reduced combat power of NPC faction pawns to hopefully allow more to spawn during raids or other events Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - Added a bunch of recipes to the Daybreaker statue which allow you to synthesise drugs in batches of 100, using half the regular amount of chemfuel - Biotech: Added the Diamond Dog xenotype and faction Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW? - New Storyteller: Sunny Starscout (more friends and less enemies) - Biotech: The Brony Xenotypes scenario now includes a changeling - All of the pony xenotypes now get along with each other - Changelings can now come in a variety of colours - Poison joke now has a chance of giving pawns the Cutie Pox - Added Alpha genes patch for alicorns and pegasi which will give newly spawned ones a shiny pair of wings Please refer to the changelog for more info!

WHAT'S NEW?
